ooc: oops, missed rukus' name in the post ><

also, note to all - the predacons and the maximals will probably 
notice this light show, since the station is fairly big. as soon as 
they find out what these guys are doing, they'll be quite unhappy 
with them =p

--Rukus--

"Done." The black and white bot says as he plots the orbial path of 
the station to match the place on earth where Dracon's energy link 
was. "We're ready to begin transporting materials down to the 
surface."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Krhinos: If you mean you're actually better at processing the ore
> rather than mining it out, that's fine by me. Anyways, that drill 
we
> brought with us is specially made to fit on one of my multi-purpose
> pod. Just engage that energy link so we can travel back and forth.
> Rukus, set us on orbit right over the link once Dracon engages it.
> We'll be good to go right after that.
>
